3 area::area ()
4 {
5  // read parameters
6  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/cell_warn", cell_warn, 1000);
7  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/resolution", resolution, 1.0);
8 
9  // check of global (gps) coordinates are used
10  string pos_type = "global";
11  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/pos_type", pos_type, pos_type);
12  global = pos_type == "local" ? false : true;
13 
14  // service client for converting gps to local coordinates
15  if (global) {
16  fix_to_pose_client = nh.serviceClient<cpswarm_msgs::FixToPose>("gps/fix_to_pose");
17  ROS_DEBUG("Wait for fix_to_pose service...");
18  fix_to_pose_client.waitForExistence();
19  }
20 
21  // map not yet rotated
22  rotation = 0;
23 }

31 bool area::get_center (cpswarm_msgs::GetPoint::Request &req, cpswarm_msgs::GetPoint::Response &res)
32 {
33  double area = 0;
34 
35  // compute centroid
36  map<double, pair<double,double>>::iterator ne;
37  for (map<double, pair<double,double>>::iterator it = coords_sorted[0].begin(); it != coords_sorted[0].end(); ++it) {
38  // next element
39  ne = next(it);
40  if (ne == coords_sorted[0].end())
41  ne = coords_sorted[0].begin();
42 
43  // sum up coordinates
44  res.point.x += (it->second.first + ne->second.first) * (it->second.first * ne->second.second - ne->second.first * it->second.second);
45  res.point.y += (it->second.second + ne->second.second) * (it->second.first * ne->second.second - ne->second.first * it->second.second);
46 
47  // sum up area
48  area += it->second.first * ne->second.second - ne->second.first * it->second.second;
49  }
50 
51  // normalize area
52  area /= 2;
53 
54  // normalize coordinates
55  res.point.x /= 6 * area;
56  res.point.y /= 6 * area;
57 
58  return true;
59 }
60 
61 bool area::get_distance (cpswarm_msgs::GetDist::Request &req, cpswarm_msgs::GetDist::Response &res)
62 {
63  bool init = true;
64 
65  // point to check
66  geometry_msgs::Point p0;
67 
68  // use origin
69  if (req.point.x == 0 && req.point.y == 0)
70  p0 = origin;
71 
72  // use given point
73  else
74  p0 = req.point;
75 
76  ROS_DEBUG("Calculate distance for point (%.2f,%.2f)", p0.x, p0.y);
77 
78  // find minimal distance to any area bound
79  map<double, pair<double,double>>::iterator ne;
80  for (map<double, pair<double,double>>::iterator it = coords_sorted[0].begin(); it != coords_sorted[0].end(); ++it) {
81  // next element
82  ne = next(it);
83  if (ne == coords_sorted[0].end())
84  ne = coords_sorted[0].begin();
85 
86 
87  // coordinates of two neighboring polygon points
88  geometry_msgs::Point p1 = pair2point(it->second);
89  geometry_msgs::Point p2 = pair2point(ne->second);
90 
91  // difference between all three points
92  geometry_msgs::Point p02;
93  p02.x = p2.x - p0.x;
94  p02.y = p2.y - p0.y;
95  geometry_msgs::Point p12;
96  p12.x = p2.x - p1.x;
97  p12.y = p2.y - p1.y;
98  geometry_msgs::Point p10;
99  p10.x = p0.x - p1.x;
100  p10.y = p0.y - p1.y;
101 
102  // calculate where on the line p12 the closest point lies
103  double dot = p12.x * p10.x + p12.y * p10.y;
104  double dis = p12.x * p12.x + p12.y * p12.y;
105  double r = dot / dis;
106 
107  // distance and closest point
108  double dist;
109  geometry_msgs::Point closest;
110  // p1 is closest point
111  if (r < 0) {
112  closest = p1;
113  dist = hypot(p10.x, p10.y);
114  }
115  // p2 is closest point
116  else if (r > 1) {
117  closest = p2;
118  dist = hypot(p02.x, p02.y);
119  }
120  // closest point is between p1 and p2
121  else {
122  closest.x = p1.x + r * p12.x;
123  closest.y = p1.y + r * p12.y;
124  dist = sqrt((p10.x * p10.x + p10.y * p10.y) - dis * r * r);
125  }
126 
127  // found smaller distance
128  if (init || dist < res.distance) {
129  ROS_DEBUG("Found closest point (%.2f,%.2f) on line (%.2f,%.2f)--(%.2f,%.2f) at distance %.2f", closest.x, closest.y, p1.x, p1.y, p2.x, p2.y, dist);
130 
131  // return closest point
132  res.closest_point = closest;
133 
134  // return line segment
135  res.closest_line.clear();
136  res.closest_line.push_back(p1);
137  res.closest_line.push_back(p2);
138 
139  // return distance
140  res.distance = dist;
141 
142  init = false;
143  }
144  }
145 
146  return true;
147 }

149 bool area::get_map (cpswarm_msgs::GetMap::Request &req, cpswarm_msgs::GetMap::Response &res)
150 {
151  // get/create map
152  res.map = get_gridmap(req.rotate, req.resolution);
153 
154  // angle of rotation
155  if (req.rotate)
156  res.rotation = rotate();
157 
158  // translate map if requested
159  if (req.translate)
160  res.translation = translate(res.map);
161 
162  return true;
163 }

167  res.point = origin;
168  return true;

178 string area::to_string ()
179 {
180  stringstream ss;
181  for (auto c : coords_sorted[0])
182  ss << "(" << c.second.first << "," << c.second.second << ") ";
183  return ss.str();
184 }
185 
186 nav_msgs::OccupancyGrid area::get_gridmap (bool rotated, double resolution)
187 {
188  // empty grid map
189  nav_msgs::OccupancyGrid gridmap;
190 
191  // rotation of map
192  double angle = 0;
193  if (rotated) {
194  angle = rotate();
195  }
196 
197  // use default resolution if not specified
198  if (resolution <= 0)
199  resolution = this->resolution;
200 
201  // requested map not existing yet
202  if (gridmaps.count(angle) == 0 || gridmaps[angle].count(resolution) == 0) {
203  // get extreme coordinates
204  double xmin = numeric_limits<double>::max();
205  double xmax = numeric_limits<double>::lowest();
206  double ymin = numeric_limits<double>::max();
207  double ymax = numeric_limits<double>::lowest();
208  for (auto p : coords[angle]) {
209  if (p.first < xmin)
210  xmin = p.first;
211  if (p.first > xmax)
212  xmax = p.first;
213  if (p.second < ymin)
214  ymin = p.second;
215  if (p.second > ymax)
216  ymax = p.second;
217  }
218 
219  // calculate dimensions
220  int x = int(ceil((xmax - xmin) / resolution));
221  int y = int(ceil((ymax - ymin) / resolution));
222 
223  // fix minimal resolution
224  if (xmax - xmin < resolution || ymax - ymin < resolution ) {
225  resolution = min(xmax - xmin, ymax - ymin);
226  x = int(ceil((xmax - xmin) / resolution));
227  y = int(ceil((ymax - ymin) / resolution));
228  ROS_WARN("Changing resolution to minimal possible %.2f, grid size %dx%d!", resolution, x, y);
229  }
230 
231  // warn about large grids
232  if (x*y > cell_warn)
233  ROS_WARN("Given coordinates seem wrong, grid map extremley large: %d cells!", x*y);
234 
235  // generate grid map data
236  cpswarm_msgs::OutOfBounds::Request req;
237  cpswarm_msgs::OutOfBounds::Response res;
238  vector<int8_t> data;
239  for (int i=0; i<y; ++i) { // row major order
240  for (int j=0; j<x; ++j) {
241  // check if center of cell is outside of area
242  if (out_of_bounds(make_pair(j * resolution + xmin + resolution / 2.0, i * resolution + ymin + resolution / 2.0), angle))
243  data.push_back(CELL_OCCUPIED); // occupied
244 
245  // inside area
246  else
247  data.push_back(CELL_FREE); // free
248  }
249  }
250  gridmap.data = data;
251 
252  // set map header
253  gridmap.header.stamp = Time::now();
254  gridmap.header.frame_id = "map";
255 
256  // set map meta data
257  gridmap.info.map_load_time == Time::now();
258  gridmap.info.resolution = resolution;
259  gridmap.info.width = x;
260  gridmap.info.height = y;
261 
262  // position of cell (0,0)
263  gridmap.info.origin.position.x = xmin;
264  gridmap.info.origin.position.y = ymin;
265 
266  gridmaps[angle][resolution] = gridmap;
267  }
268 
269  // return existing or newly generated grid map
270  if (gridmaps.count(angle) > 0 && gridmaps[angle].count(resolution) > 0)
271  return gridmaps[angle][resolution];
272 
273  // return empty grid map
274  ROS_WARN("Providing empty map!");
275  return gridmap;
276 }
277 
278 void area::global_to_local ()
279 {
280  cpswarm_msgs::FixToPose f2p;
281 
282  // convert given area to local coordinates
283  set<pair<double,double>> local;
284  for (auto c : coords[0]) {
285  f2p.request.fix.longitude = c.first;
286  f2p.request.fix.latitude = c.second;
287  if (fix_to_pose_client.call(f2p)) {
288  local.emplace(f2p.response.pose.pose.position.x, f2p.response.pose.pose.position.y);
289  }
290  else
291  ROS_FATAL("AREA_PROV - Failed to convert area bounds to local coordinates");
292  }
293  coords[0] = local;
294 
295  sort_coords();
296 }
297 
298 void area::set_origin ()
299 {
300  if (global) {
301  cpswarm_msgs::FixToPose f2p;
302 
303  // get origin from gps node
304  ServiceClient get_gps_origin_client = nh.serviceClient<cpswarm_msgs::GetGpsFix>("gps/get_gps_origin");
305  ROS_DEBUG("Wait for get_gps_origin service...");
306  get_gps_origin_client.waitForExistence();
307  cpswarm_msgs::GetGpsFix gpso;
308  if (get_gps_origin_client.call(gpso)) {
309  // convert origin to local coordinates
310  f2p.request.fix = gpso.response.fix;
311  if (fix_to_pose_client.call(f2p)) {
312  origin = f2p.response.pose.pose.position;
313  }
314  else
315  ROS_FATAL("AREA_PROV - Failed to convert origin to local coordinates");
316  }
317  else
318  ROS_FATAL("AREA_PROV - Failed get GPS coordinates of origin");
319  }
320 
321  else {
322  // read origin from parameters
323  double x,y;
324  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/x", x, 0.0);
325  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/y", y, 0.0);
326  origin.x = x;
327  origin.y = y;
328  }
329 }
330 
331 vector<geometry_msgs::Point> area::set2vector (set<pair<double,double>> set)
332 {
333  vector<geometry_msgs::Point> vector;
334  for (auto pair : set) {
335  vector.push_back(pair2point(pair));
336  }
337  return vector;
338 }
339 
340 void area::sort_coords ()
341 {
342  coords_sorted.clear();
343 
344  // coordinates of different rotations
345  for (auto c : coords) {
346  // rotation of coordinates
347  double rot = c.first;
348 
349  // compute centroid / barycenter
350  pair<double,double> center;
351  for (auto cc : c.second) {
352  center.first += cc.first;
353  center.second += cc.second;
354  }
355  center.first /= c.second.size();
356  center.second /= c.second.size();
357 
358  // sort by angle around center
359  double angle;
360  for (auto cc : c.second) {
361  angle = atan2(cc.second-center.second, cc.first-center.first);
362  coords_sorted[rot][angle] = cc;
363  }
364  }
365 }
366 
367 set<pair<double,double>> area::vector2set (vector<geometry_msgs::Point> vector)
368 {
369  set<pair<double,double>> set;
370  for (auto point : vector) {
371  set.insert(point2pair(point));
372  }
373  return set;
374 }
375 
376 bool area::is_left (pair<double,double> p0, pair<double,double> p1, pair<double,double> p2)
377 {
378  // >0 for p2 left of the line through p0 and p1
379  // =0 for p2 on the line
380  // <0 for p2 right of the line
381  return ((p1.first - p0.first) * (p2.second - p0.second) - (p2.first - p0.first) * (p1.second - p0.second)) > 0;
382 }
383 
384 bool area::is_right (pair<double,double> p0, pair<double,double> p1, pair<double,double> p2)
385 {
386  // >0 for p2 left of the line through p0 and p1
387  // =0 for p2 on the line
388  // <0 for p2 right of the line
389  return ((p1.first - p0.first) * (p2.second - p0.second) - (p2.first - p0.first) * (p1.second - p0.second)) < 0;
390 }
391 
392 bool area::on_bound (pair<double,double> pos, double angle)
393 {
394  double d01x, d01y, d01, d02x, d02y, d02, d12x, d12y, d12;
395 
396  // loop through all edges of the polygon
397  map<double, pair<double,double>>::iterator ne;
398  for (map<double, pair<double,double>>::iterator it = coords_sorted[angle].begin(); it != coords_sorted[angle].end(); ++it) {
399  // next element in set
400  ne = next(it);
401  if (ne == coords_sorted[angle].end())
402  ne = coords_sorted[angle].begin();
403 
404  // distances between points
405  d01x = ne->second.first - it->second.first;
406  d01y = ne->second.second - it->second.second;
407  d01 = hypot(d01x, d01y);
408  d02x = pos.first - it->second.first;
409  d02y = pos.second - it->second.second;
410  d02 = hypot(d02x, d02y);
411  d12x = pos.first - ne->second.first;
412  d12y = pos.second - ne->second.second;
413  d12 = hypot(d12x, d12y);
414 
415  // close enough to boundary
416  if (abs(d02 + d12 - d01) < 0.0001)
417  return true;
418  }
419 
420  // not on boundary
421  return false;
422 }
423 
424 bool area::out_of_bounds (pair<double,double> pos, double angle)
425 {
426  // points on boundary are not out of bounds
427  if (on_bound(pos, angle))
428  return false;
429 
430  // the winding number counter, i.e., how often a ray from the point to the right crosses the boundary
431  int wn = 0;
432 
433  // loop through all edges of the polygon
434  map<double, pair<double,double>>::iterator ne;
435  for (map<double, pair<double,double>>::iterator it = coords_sorted[angle].begin(); it != coords_sorted[angle].end(); ++it) {
436  // next element in set
437  ne = next(it);
438  if (ne == coords_sorted[angle].end())
439  ne = coords_sorted[angle].begin();
440 
441  // ray crosses upward edge
442  if (it->second.second <= pos.second && pos.second < ne->second.second && is_left(it->second, ne->second, pos))
443  ++wn;
444 
445  // ray crosses downward edge
446  else if (ne->second.second <= pos.second && pos.second < it->second.second && is_right(it->second, ne->second, pos))
447  --wn;
448  }
449 
450  // pose is outside
451  if (wn == 0)
452  return true;
453 
454  // pose is inside
455  return false;
456 }
457 
458 geometry_msgs::Point area::pair2point (pair<double,double> pair)
459 {
460  geometry_msgs::Point point;
461  point.x = pair.first;
462  point.y = pair.second;
463  return point;
464 }

466 pair<double,double> area::point2pair (geometry_msgs::Point point)
467 {
468  pair<double,double> pair;
469  pair.first = point.x;
470  pair.second = point.y;
471  return pair;
472 }
473 
474 double area::rotate ()
475 {
476  // map has already been rotated
477  if (rotation != 0)
478  return rotation;
479 
480  // bottom most point
481  map<double, pair<double,double>>::iterator bot = coords_sorted[0].begin();
482  for (auto it = coords_sorted[0].begin(); it != coords_sorted[0].end(); ++it)
483  if (it->second.second < bot->second.second)
484  bot = it;
485 
486  // previous point
487  map<double, pair<double,double>>::iterator pr;
488  if (bot == coords_sorted[0].begin())
489  pr = prev(coords_sorted[0].end());
490  else
491  pr = prev(bot);
492 
493  // next point
494  map<double, pair<double,double>>::iterator ne = next(bot);
495  if (ne == coords_sorted[0].end())
496  ne = coords_sorted[0].begin();
497 
498  // calculate rotation
499  if (pr->second.second < ne->second.second || pr->second.second == ne->second.second && pr->second.second != bot->second.second) // prefer counter-clockwise rotation in case of tie
500  rotation = -atan2(bot->second.second - pr->second.second, bot->second.first - pr->second.first);
501  else if (pr->second.second > ne->second.second)
502  rotation = -atan2(ne->second.second - bot->second.second, ne->second.first - bot->second.first);
503  else
504  return 0;
505 
506  ROS_DEBUG("Rotate map by %.2f...", rotation);
507 
508  // rotate coordinates
509  pair<double,double> rot;
510  if (coords.count(rotation) == 0) {
511  stringstream css;
512  for (auto c : coords[0]) {
513  rot.first = c.first * cos(rotation) - c.second * sin(rotation);
514  rot.second = c.first * sin(rotation) + c.second * cos(rotation);
515  coords[rotation].insert(rot);
516  css << "(" << rot.first << "," << rot.second << ") ";
517  }
518  ROS_DEBUG("Rotated coordinates: %s", css.str().c_str());
519  }
520 
521  // rotate sorted coordinates
522  if (coords_sorted.count(rotation) == 0)
523  for (auto c : coords_sorted[0]) {
524  rot.first = c.second.first * cos(rotation) - c.second.second * sin(rotation);
525  rot.second = c.second.first * sin(rotation) + c.second.second * cos(rotation);
526  coords_sorted[rotation][c.first] = rot;
527  }
528 
529  return rotation;
530 }
531 
532 geometry_msgs::Vector3 area::translate (nav_msgs::OccupancyGrid& map)
533 {
534  // compute required translation
535  geometry_msgs::Vector3 translation;
536  translation.x = round(map.info.origin.position.x) - map.info.origin.position.x;
537  translation.y = round(map.info.origin.position.y) - map.info.origin.position.y;
538  ROS_DEBUG("Translate map by (%.2f,%.2f)...", translation.x, translation.y);
539 
540  // translate origin
541  map.info.origin.position.x += translation.x;
542  map.info.origin.position.y += translation.y;
543 
544  // update meta data
545  map.info.map_load_time = Time::now();
546 
547  return translation;
548 }
